mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS_OWNER WHERE owner_id=#{owner_id} AND owner_pwd = MD5(#{owner_pwd})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS_OWNER (owner_id, owner_pwd,owner_name,owner_address,owner_email,owner_tel,owner_created) VALUES (#{owner_id}, MD5(#{owner_pwd}), #{owner_name}, #{owner_address}, #{owner_email},#{owner_tel}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM ROOMS r JOIN HANOKS h ON r.hanok_id = h.hanok_id JOIN USERS_OWNER uo ON h.owner_id = uo.owner_id WHERE uo.owner_id = #{uo.owner_pwd};
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS_OWNER SET owner_tel = #{owner_tel}, owner_address = #{owner_address}, businessNum = #{businessNum} WHERE owner_id = #{owner_id}
